attributes.action: save Braintree Town FC from the planners at Braintree Distrct Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Braintree Town FC want to sell a small plot of land to finance improvements to their ground. The planning department of Braintree District Council is making it difficult for two reasons.
1- they require excessive recompense for a release of the covenant amounting to 40% of the land sale.
2- They require 60% of the site for affordable housing that makes the project for a developer not viable
